name: Space Invaders (itch) (Ziszle)
description:
A space invaders clone built using C++ and the Raylib framework.

The game has been tested on Debian and Arch Linux

The music, SFX, and art assets are original but also open source and free to be used elsewhere.

SFX created using the wonderful open source tool: https://raylibtech.itch.io/rfxgen

The source code for the game can be found here: https://github.com/Ziszel/space-invaders-clone
